com.arm.mbed.cloud.sdk.subscribe

Interface Observer<T extends NotificationMessageValue>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the notification message value.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractObserver, AsynchronousResponseObserver, DeviceStateObserver, ResourceValueObserver

    @Preamble(description="Cloud notification observer")
public interface Observer<T extends NotificationMessageValue>
    Object based on ReactiveX's Flowable and attempting to provide a solution following the Observer pattern which reacts to Pelion Cloud notifications such as device state changes, sensor value changes, etc.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        Gets Observer's unique identifier.
        Returns:
        a UUID.

      • addCallback

        void addCallback(NotificationCallback<T> callback)
        Adds a callback function to be executed every time a notification is received.

        Note: use callbacks when you want to carry out single actions when notifications are received.

        If you want to perform combined and complex actions in such events, please consider using flow() instead.

        Parameters:
        callback - callback to add.

      • notify

        void notify(NotificationMessage<T> message)
     throws MbedCloudException
        Notifies a message to the observer.
        Parameters:
        message - a notification message.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process.

      • notify

        void notify(T data)
     throws MbedCloudException
        Notifies data change to the observer.
        Parameters:
        data - some data of interest
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process.

      • removeCallback

        void removeCallback()
        Removes all callbacks registered to the observer.

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe()
          throws MbedCloudException
        Unregister the observer from the system.

        Note: the communication channel comprised within the observer will also be closed.

        Hence, the observer should not be used after this action.

        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error happened during the process

      • flow

        io.reactivex.Flowable<T> flow()
        Gets the RxJava Flowable/communication channel the observer is based on.

        Such object can be considered as a stream of asynchronous events with the same sort of simple, composable operations that you use for collections of data items like arrays.

        Returns:
        underlying flowable.
        See Also:
        ReactiveX documentation

      • singleNotification

        io.reactivex.Single<T> singleNotification(@Nullable
                                          TimePeriod timeout)
                                   throws MbedCloudException
        Gets an RxJava Single for one notification.
        Parameters:
        timeout - time before which a notification must be received.
        Returns:
        a single.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process.

      • futureOne

        java.util.concurrent.Future<T> futureOne()
                                  throws MbedCloudException
        Gets a future for one notification.

        The data will be returned when a notification has been emitted to the communication channel.

        Returns:
        a future.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process.

      • futureOne

        java.util.concurrent.Future<T> futureOne(@Nullable
                                         TimePeriod timeout)
                                  throws MbedCloudException
        Gets a future for one notification.

        Similar to futureOne() but a timeout is set on the communication channel.

        Parameters:
        timeout - time before which a notification must be received.
        Returns:
        a future.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process.

      • one

        @Nullable
T one()
          throws MbedCloudException
        Gets one notification data (the first one emitted to the communication channel).

        Note: after the notification is received, the observer is unsubscribed and therefore will become unusable.

        Returns:
        notification data.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process or the timeout was elapsed.

      • one

        @Nullable
T one(@Nullable
                 TimePeriod timeout)
          throws MbedCloudException
        Gets one notification data (the first one emitted to the communication channel).

        Similar to futureOne() but a timeout is set on the communication channel.

        Parameters:
        timeout - time before which a notification must be received.
        Returns:
        notification data.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if a problem occurred during the process or the timeout was elapsed.

      • numberOfCallbacks

        int numberOfCallbacks()
        Gets the number of callbacks registered to this observer.
        Returns:
        the number of callbacks.

      • isDisposed

        boolean isDisposed()
        States whether the observer has been disposed or not.

        If it is the case, no messages will be able to go through the communication channel it comprises.

        Returns:
        True if the observer has been disposed. False otherwise.

      • getSubscriptionType

        SubscriptionType getSubscriptionType()
        Gets the subscription type of the observer.
        Returns:
        type

        Gets the string representation of the observer.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string
